p: In keeping with prior observations [ 10], EARS-based surveillance exhibited a better performance when using CDA2 for ARI case detection than when using CDA1, with consistently shorter outbreak detection delay at any FAR for both study periods (in Fig 3, compare CDA1 (open black diamonds) to CDA2 (open black squares) across panels A and C (2002–03) and across panels B and D (2003–04).
